mapper.sql: receive_id, contact, tel, receive_province, receive_city, receive_county, receive_address, user_id, del_state, isDefault,create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_user_receive where del_state=2
and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by create_time desc

select
from t_user_receive where del_state = 2 and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by create_time desc limit 1

mapper.update:
update t_user_receive
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_province = #{receiveProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_city = #{receiveCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_county = #{receiveCounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_address = #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_state = #{delState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
isDefault = #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where receive_id = #{receiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
